detailsData.title: Experienced Representation
detailsData.content: With 40 years of experience, we provide top-notch legal advice and representation.

detailsData.title: Specialized Services
detailsData.content: We offer unique services in contract negotiation, business formation, and family law.

detailsData.title: Leading-edge Strategies
detailsData.content: We provide cutting-edge strategies to ensure success in business ventures.

address: 9440 Santa Monica Boulevard, Suite 301 Beverly Hills, California 90210
subHeading: Solving complex litigation in Business, Entertainment and Family Law.
valueProp: The Law Offices Of Attorney Ronald M. Lebow, located in Los Angeles, California, represents individuals, small and large businesses, and creative talent in the areas of entertainment, business, and family law.
